original: 'bring sgra dang dum ga chen 'ong /

analyzed: gzugs sgra gang byung yang skrag par mi bya'o //

translated: If such signs do not occur, at dawn one should examine the dream. If that is not accomplished, one should practice in the same way in the following month.

analyzed: des kyang ma grub na yang phyi ma'i zla ba la bsgrub bo //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i don thams cad 'grub bo //

original: dgra dang nad thams cad zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: dgra dang nad thams cad zhi bar byed do //

original: tshe ring ba bskal pa bdun thub par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshe ring ba bskal pa bdun thub par 'gyur /
translated: One will live a long life, able to endure seven eons.

original: nor mang ba zad pa med cing dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi lang bar 'byor ro //
analyzed: nor mang ba zad pa med cing dpag tu med pa brjod kyis mi lang bar 'byor ro //
translated: One will have abundant wealth, inexhaustible and immeasurable, beyond description.

original: gal te gnod par byed pa byung na yang khros pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu 'chi bar byed do //
analyzed: gal te gnod par byed pa byung na yang khros pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu 'chi bar byed do //
translated: Even if harm should occur, by merely being angry, it will immediately be destroyed.

original: 'bring ni lta sgom gyi nyams myong skye /
analyzed: 'bring ni lta sgom gyi nyams myong skye /

original: bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur /
analyzed: bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur /

analyzed: bkra shis par byed pa dang dgra 'chi bar yang byed do //

original: tha ma yang nor 'phel par byed cing dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: grub nas rtag tu bsten pa ni zla ba nya gang ba thams cad la gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
translated: Having accomplished [the practice], the constant reliance is to offer a bali on all full moon days.

original: dngos grub gang byung ba de cha drug tu bgos te bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum spyi dang / sems can dag la cha re re sbyin /

original: phyed kyis sgrub pa po'i 'tsho ba bya'o //
analyzed: phyed kyis sgrub pa po'i 'tsho ba bya'o //
translated: With half of the remaining part, the adept should live.

original: sgrub pa'i dus su zas dkar gsum bza' zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i dus su zas dkar gsum bza' zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: At the time of practice, one should eat the three white foods and be clean.

original: rtag tu khrus la brtson par bya'o ;
analyzed: rtag tu khrus la brtson par bya'o ;
translated: One should always strive to bathe.

original: /'di grub na yon tan dpag tu med do //
analyzed: /'di grub na yon tan dpag tu med do //
translated: If this is accomplished, the qualities are immeasurable.

original: 'di la gdeng bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di la gdeng bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub ste /
translated: This is accomplished by possessing four kinds of confidence.

original: mgo gnon ye shes bsnyen pa'i gdeng /
analyzed: mgo gnon ye shes bsnyen pa'i gdeng /
translated: The confidence of approaching the wisdom that suppresses the head,

original: yang dag lta ba'i gdeng /üîΩmi nyams pa dam tshig gi gdeng /
analyzed: yang dag lta ba'i gdeng / mi nyams pa dam tshig gi gdeng /
translated: the confidence of the correct view,üîΩthe confidence of the commitments that do not decline,

original: the tshom med pa nges pa'i gdeng ngo //
analyzed: the tshom med pa nges pa'i gdeng ngo //
translated: and the confidence of certainty without doubt.

original: de la lta ba ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la lta ba ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya'o //
translated: With regard to that, the view is that all phenomena should be understood to be like an illusion.

original: dam tshig ni bla ma mnyes par bya zhing gsang la sgrub ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni bla ma mnyes par bya zhing gsang la sgrub ste /
translated: The commitments are to please the guru, to keep it secret, and to practice.

original: gzhan la thabs 'di bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan la thabs 'di bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not teach this method to others.

original: gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud rdzogs so /
analyzed: gnod sbyin chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rgyud rdzogs so /
translated: The Tantra of the Means of Accomplishment of the Great Yak·π£a AparƒÅjita is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi bla ma dz'a m'a ris bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi bla ma dz'a m'a ris bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Indian master JƒÅma ri.
